description:
Remove LSO token fetch from TokenService.

BUG=269532
TBR=kinaba@chromium.org

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=218025

messages.text:
Hi Drew,

Please take a look.  Thanks.

LGTM but if you could also remove the error param to OnRefreshTokenRevoked() now, I could stop nagging you about it :-P

https://codereview.chromium.org/22571004/diff/76001/chrome/browser/signin/profile_oauth2_token_service.cc
File chrome/browser/signin/profile_oauth2_token_service.cc (left):

https://codereview.chromium.org/22571004/diff/76001/chrome/browser/signin/profile_oauth2_token_service.cc#oldcode165
chrome/browser/signin/profile_oauth2_token_service.cc:165: FireRefreshTokenRevoked(GetAccountId(profile_), tok_details->error());
So, is the |error| parameter sent to FireRefreshTokenRevoked() now obsolete since we only send REQUEST_CANCELED to it? Can we remove it now?

Thanks Drew.  I removed error argument.  This only seems to materially affect PSS, where I hard coded REQUEST_CANCELED.  I'll commit shortly.

https://codereview.chromium.org/22571004/diff/76001/chrome/browser/signin/profile_oauth2_token_service.cc
File chrome/browser/signin/profile_oauth2_token_service.cc (left):

https://codereview.chromium.org/22571004/diff/76001/chrome/browser/signin/profile_oauth2_token_service.cc#oldcode165
chrome/browser/signin/profile_oauth2_token_service.cc:165: FireRefreshTokenRevoked(GetAccountId(profile_), tok_details->error());
On 2013/08/16 13:09:27, Andrew T Wilson wrote:
> So, is the |error| parameter sent to FireRefreshTokenRevoked() now obsolete
> since we only send REQUEST_CANCELED to it? Can we remove it now?

Done.

CQ is trying da patch. Follow status at
https://chromium-status.appspot.com/cq/rogerta@chromium.org/22571004/80001

subject: Remove LSO token fetch from TokenService.
